transcript: Oh, yes I am. Oh, yes I am. Let go of me! You let go! You're a cruel thing! I loved and I hate you! Mary will get help! Never, never, never, never! I hope you die in torment! You BAST!

segments.text: Oh, yes I am. Oh, yes I am. Let go of me! You let go! You're a cruel thing! I loved and I hate you!
Mary will get help! Never, never, never, never! I hope you die in torment! You BAST!

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Oh yes I am...Oh yes I am. Let go of me. You let go. You...urgh...You're a cruel friend. I loathe and I hate you. Marry you again...Ha...Never, never, never, never. I hope you die in torment. You beast.
